snippet.title: Astroneer - Rover Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy it now on Steam and Xbox Play Anywhere: https://www.astroneer.space

Rovers are now more configurable than ever! The Rover Update contains a new vehicle, updated driving controls, new ways to use rovers in fun ways, and a ton of performance upgrades!

https://twitter.com/astroneergame/
https://www.facebook.com/astroneergame/
https://www.discord.gg/astroneer
https://forum.systemera.net/forum

Special thanks to Bro Zelly Gaming for letting us zip around his track!
